title: New details of torture, cover-ups in China's internment camps revealed in Amnesty International report
content:
1. New details of torture, cover-ups in China's internment camps revealed in Amnesty International report  NBC News
  2. China has created a 'dystopian hellscape' in Xinjiang, Amnesty report says  BBC News
  3. ‘Crimes against humanity’ detailed in China’s Xinjiang: Amnesty  Al Jazeera English
  4. How China went from celebrating ethnic diversity to suppressing it  The Guardian
  5. Uyghur Relatives Deployed by China to Counter Abuse Testimony Rejected as ‘Forced’ Witnesses  Radio Free Asia
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
